Context: AppsAnywhere is a free service for George Brown students, staff, and faculty to access software on-demand, anytime, from anywhere. The dashboard provides easy access to all necessary apps, with favorites and categories for quick sorting. System requirements for using AppsAnywhere are not specified in the text. The website may be subject to change without notice, and users are responsible for verifying George Brown College fee requirements. Contact information: 416-415-2000 (voice), 1-877-515-5559 (TTY), ask.george@georgebrown.ca. Social Media Hub available on the website. No specific program information is mentioned in the text.
